attributes.action: provide all ducks, swans and geese in parks, and preferably in nature reserves aswell, with an indoor shelter with warm bedding for the birds to go into at night in harsh icy and snowy winters. Otherwise the birds will be frozen overnight. And for them to go into in the daytime aswell if they wish to.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All duck, swan and geese ponds in parks, and preferably in nature reserves aswell, should have an indoor shelter with warm bedding for the birds to go into at night in harsh icy and snowy winters. Otherwise the birds will be frozen overnight. And for them to go into in the daytime aswell if they wish to. Also some extra food to eat and water available (unfrozen). The park or nature reserve could employ a park keeper or park ranger to make sure that all the ducks, swans and geese are all warm, dry and sheltered and comfortable for the night and provide the extra food and water made available to them. The birds could use this shelter all year round both day and night.
